form.placement-notes: Note that I do not tattoo these places: sternum, spine, neck area, ears/back of the ears, fingers and feet.
form.refImage-notes: You can put the link of multiple images here. You can also send me images by email once I have replied to you.
form.questions-notes: Do not hesitate if you have questions regarding your appointment or anything else.
form.description-notes: Veniam enim ullamco anim minim aute incididunt laboris veniam.
form.wellVaccinated: I certify that I will be vaccinated adequatily at least one week before the appointment.
form.valideInfo: I certify that the info above are correct.
form.text1: To book an appointment, please fill out this form as precisely as possible. If you want multiple projects or flashes, please only fill out one form.
form.text2: If your project is selected, you will be contacted by
form.text4: to establish your appointments date and time.
form.text6: In order to confirm your appointment,
form.text10: The appointment is not confirmed until the deposit is transferred!
form.text11: Thanks for your interest in my art. It is greatly appreciated.
form.text12: Looking forward to create with you!
form.text13: To book multiple flashes, please write the numbers separated by 'and/&'. If you want to book just one flash but you like more than one, please write the numbers separated by 'or'.
form.alert: YOUPII!! You request has been sent. Please, make sure to look at your emails and also yout spams. SEE SOU SOON !!

modal.1st_para: Please note that the healing of a tattoo takes 2 to 3 weeks.  Make sure you cover it from the sun and do not submerge it for the healing period.
modal.2nd_para: To contact me, you can reach me by email at

construction.come_back: Come back soon to see some fun and colors!
